title: Ping is roughly 35-40 ms higher than normal after patch
body: As title says. I have confirmed the other game I play ping is normal. Running network speed test gives the standard speed. What possible solutions to solve this problem?

replies.body: Same with me 35 to 40 ms increase. I have had a the same ping since forever 36 to 39 ms sustianed with a Ethernet cable of course. I log in after the patch and it's now 85 to 89ms. I thought it was my internet company but ran speed test and other games have not changed. Has to be some kind of bug. Come on riot.

same here lol, and when my ping does drop back down to 36 I still feel laggy, as if im getting stutter. Im not feeling fluid movement.

Same problem for me this patch went from 40~ to 97 
comcast in colorado

http://prntscr.com/gc9pfg

It's not that much of an increase, but we can certainly see about getting that smoothed out still. First things first you could try using an ethernet connection as opposed to a wireless one. if that doesn't seem to help, go ahead and run through the rest of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure everything is configured in the best way for League.
